name: Leaving, 2153
description:
Join Pritha Anand as she flies into the sun, saves humanity, and is very, very alone doing it. 

This is a little 10,000-word kinetic novel to take you through quarantine.  This is a linear story that is a (stand alone) follow-up to the game San Francisco, 2118.  This has been tested for play in Firefox and Chrome.

Throw a buck or two to a starving, isolated artist, if you can.

Cover art by Penelope Evans:  wonderbreath, @olbeyblade_jpeg
